channel.title: RuneSource Item Bonuses
channel.description:
[center]RuneSource Item Bonuses and Interfaces[/center]
Hello moparians! :D
I wrote the almost-fully item bonuses with interfaces on our project called "RuneFocus", but Founder made few changes in project so I stopped working with it.
[b]I have permission from I Roll Deep![/b]
NB!
There is no special attack bar interfaces because i didn't find the Interface ID :( , and you need to add, like 500 more bonuses. (Make something yourself too) :D:D
[url=http://www.upload.ee/files/1725325/equipdefs.xml.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/1725325/equipdefs.xml.html[/url]
P.S Sorry for bad English Guys! :o

I have to search my whole PC then I Hope I haven’t deleted them

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Item Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:11, topic:417874”][quote author=I Roll Deep link=topic=520423.msg3779916#msg3779916 date=1318374988]

Could you update the IDs up to like 12000? My client looks like a modified PI client so it holds up to 12,000ish.

Wow, it’s freaking much

But I’m too busy to do it right now, sorry

Could you pm me whatever file you used to get all of these? (only if you want to) I’ll get 'em myself, I’m not doing much.

He used rswiki or something like this idk, he was typing the bonuses him selff :PP

Holy shit, that must have took forever…

Yuh, he was writing it even when he was in school
[/quote]

Sounds like he had loads of fun doing that.[/quote]
He was working on the website, and he was like “Can I do the item bonuses pl0x”

Read full topic
